articles.title: The Vision Pro is getting its first live ‘immersive’ sports - The Verge

articles.title: Apple and Google reluctantly comply with Texas age verification law - Ars Technica
articles.description: Texas requires sensitive info just to check weather and sports scores, Apple says.
